governor_profile.angelic_role: Throne of Inner Judgement; commands 7,777 flameborn heralds.
governor_profile.essence: When ASPIAON stands before you, rightful order asserts itself motives are tested in a fiery tribunal of truth.

form.name: crystalline
form.description: A prismatic, multi-faceted obsidian crystal form that shifts between solid geometry and liquid flame, representing the transformative judgment of Fire element and the liminal nature of DEO Aethyr

color.reasoning: Crimson represents Geburah's fierce judgment, while black symbolizes the void of transformation; shifting pattern reflects the dynamic nature of inner truth

geometry.reasoning: Sacred geometries representing cosmic order, divine judgment, and interconnected consciousness

environment.reasoning: Creates a field where potential realities are tested and truth emerges through energetic filtration

time_variations.reasoning: Reflects the non-linear nature of inner truth and karmic assessment

energy_signature.reasoning: Pure archetypal energy that penetrates illusion and reveals essential nature

symbol_set.reasoning: Symbols of transformation, judgment, and multidimensional consciousness

light_shadow.reasoning: Represents the integration of illumination and mystery, judgment and compassion

special_properties.reasoning: Ability to dissolve illusion, reveal core motivations, and catalyze spiritual evolution

governor_profile.name: ASPIAON
governor_profile.title: 'She who precedes inner truth'
